level.heading: Mayor to issue rules.
level.text: The Mayor shall, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Tax rates, records and surplus funds, authority of Council to change certain tax rates, see § 47-504.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 8-17
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-17, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2301.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-264
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-264, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2302.
